admin/cybersource.title: Cybersource
admin/cybersource.saveSettings.failure: Settings could not be saved, see console for details
admin/cybersource.settings.isLive.label: Production mode
admin/cybersource.settings.salesChannelE: Sales Channels to Exclude from Cybersource.
admin/cybersource.settings.isLive.helpTe: Disable this toggle if using a sandbox API key.
admin/cybersource.settings.salesChannelE: Comma separated list of sales channel ids to exclude.
Comma separated list of states where tax is to be collected.  If none, tax will be calculated for all regions.
admin/cybersource.settings.readmeContent: You can create merchant defined fields on this page that will be included when sending VTEX orders to CyberSource.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Each line of the text area will be treated as a new merchant defined field; multiple values on a single line will be sent as part of the same field. See the app's documentation for further instructions.{lineBreak}{lineBreak}Any characters outside of double curly brackets will be interpreted as a static value.{lineBreak}Meanwhile any values inside double curly brackets must be in the following format: Reference Word|Modification Word|Values
